abstract: Northcote - Personal reminiscences of growing up in Northcote.
description: Combines locational footage with personal reminiscences of growing up in Northcote. This film is an excerpt from 'Stories from the hidden city', a project conceived and directed by Bagryana Popov, 2000-2002.
